name: sudokuist
description: A minimal web-based Sudoku application with Rust WASM backend

scripts.build-wasm: wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg --dev && cp pkg/sudoku_wasm.js pkg/sudoku_wasm_bg.wasm public/
scripts.build-wasm-release: wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg && cp pkg/sudoku_wasm.js pkg/sudoku_wasm_bg.wasm public/
scripts.build-ts: cp -r pkg src/ && tsc && vite build && mkdir -p dist/styles && cp styles/* dist/styles/ && cp public/* dist/
scripts.build: npm run build-wasm && npm run build-ts
scripts.dev: npm run build-wasm && cp -r pkg src/ && vite --port 3000
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist pkg src/pkg public/*.js public/*.wasm

author: Sudokuist
